page.title: 01A Stranger in Norfolk
page.content: England has always been a country where{people in need were {welcomed.}This in mind one expects that to live in England as a foreigner one would{not have too many {difficulties. { } In general I can confirm this. The English people are very friendly and help you as a foreigner wherever they can. Particulary when you are aware of the fact that you are living in a foreign country and{adapt to it's {customs and way of life.}It seems to be easy to live here.However, there can be quite a{few problems}when you look at some details.
